Jeff Cheney
===========

[City Council](https://www.friscotexas.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=38)  
Title: Mayor  
Phone: [972-292-5050](tel:9722925050)
  
[Biography](https://www.friscotexas.gov/586)
  
[Email](mailto:jcheney@friscotexas.gov)
